Name: sharmas17344
Title: Fun activity
Review: Really enjoyed solving the mystery... It is a real fun way to get away from daily hustle... get into the theme, and think like a detective. Will surely visit again :))

Name: sachinyadav522
Title: It was great experience
Review: It was really hard and entertaining experiece a must do experience. Themes were really great. Will visit again soon

Name: aadi2312999
Title: Unable to understand the concept
Review: Its just waste of time and money. I suggest you to invest this amount somewhere else. Per head amount is very high. Value they are providing is very less.

Name: singhbulika04
Title: Murder mystery
Review: Excellent . It was awesome experience. Puzzles were very nice n trucy. We also made reels at last. It was fun overall.

Name: sakshamgupta26
Title: Best experience
Review: It was my first experience I liked it the most. I would prefer it to my friends and siblings. And i want to be come again .

Name: shreyasharma_aug15
Title: Amazing experience
Review: It was an amazing experience with friends. Small birthday celebrations can also be done there. Puzzles were really good.

Name: ris04hit
Title: Fun at mystery room
Review: It was really fun at mystery room. Different locks to open and different types of puzzles to be explored. Though I find it little costly but still it is fun!

Name: someonewhovisitsalot
Title: Great fun
Review: It was really fun. The room, the props, the clues, everything was great. I will try each and every room. It is great fun.

Name: shnitish
Title: Fun but expensive
Review: Puzzles were very good and they also give hints if you are stuck, but the ticket price is too much in my opinion. They can make it a bit affordable :)

Name: NeelRai6
Title: Cabin in the woods
Review: This was a nice place to visit with friends as it requires teamworkOverall good place for childrenAnd if you play any of the map decode even the smallest things

Name: soumildhingra
Title: Soumil
Review: It was very fun, went with my friends and it was a very good experience for all of us. We played Cabin In The Woods

Name: devansharora072010
Title: It was very bad .It was not the worth of 900 rupees
Review: It was not the worth of 900 rupees it was the worst I hav ever played.pls try to improve aar I will not come next time

Name: guptarippy
Title: Fantastic
Review: The mystery was Very interesting and time using concept..kids enjoyed alot..even we have small kids also

Name: nidhiprasadcs
Title: Best games
Review: I really liked the concept. Children really had fun and it helps in using their  cognitive skills and learning.its a mast paise vasool

Name: vinayvashisth
Title: Very Decent Place for group of friends
Review: Very fun place to hangout for a quick fun tour.There are many different story mode available. Inferno was the hardest out there and we managed to complete it by 80%.Time Well SpentI'll recommend this to everyone

Name: prisheeta22
Title: Amazing
Review: It was really exciting and enthusiastic experience. Would love to revisit and enjoy again. Thanks a lot!

Name: adarshbhagat142
Title: Great Experience
Review: It was an amazing experience. It was our first time and we enjoyed a lot. Working together to solve the puzzles. It was fun.

Name: manormagairola1995
Title: The hurt Locker
Review: This was my first time to visit mystery room, it was little bit difficult to solve puzzles but interesting to found the clips, we enjoyed.

Name: aksheya07
Title: Very nice
Review: really great experience of real life escape  game with my friends  . Had a great experience in my mystery room... this very unique and owsm game....

Name: arorakhushi11072011
Title: It was great! I really liked it
Review: It was great and fun the clues were amazing it was a bit hard but we got it almost through the end :)

Name: Tadbeer13
Title: Amazing experience
Review: In short, It was a great experience. All the members are very kind and sweet.Will visit again for sure!!!

Name: aanchaladv
Title: Everything was great
Review: Everything was great except the ticket price they are charging too much.. else it was a thrilling experience. Ticket price shall be less. Can also add some food stalls near the place.

Name: sarthakbohidar2310
Title: great fun
Review: Great fun, lots of fun themes to choose from, a mystery at every difficulty level to solve, the feeling of solving mystery is out of the world

Name: akansha3804
Title: My experience
Review: My experience inside the mystery room was great. It was a real life escape challenge. The only thing due to which I deducted one star is the price. The cost is too high for each person also and the extra time cost is also very high.

Name: Vipin Kundnani
Title: Not sufficient time
Review: When in any game the time described in 1 hr. then why do you sell extra time to complete the remaining part ? I mean if you already know the game length is 75 minutes then why you given 60 minutes ? You sold 15 minutes time for extra Rs.500. Or you should shorten the length. I mean Rs.900 each ticket for 1 hr. is not enough for you. You play tricks to charge extra during the game.

Name: manavahlawatxd
Title: One of the best experience!!!
Review: Look , mystery room is a nice concept if you want to spend good time with your friends. Just go for it !!!

Name: A200723
Title: It was way too expensive for the duration
Review: The visit was way to expensive, I’d want to go again but I’d prefer not due to the price hike. The last price was a lot less than now.

Name: TeamNewDelhi
Title: Prison Break Escape Room
Review: Our group had a fun time in the prison break escape room. There were a variety of puzzles to solve. The team at Mystery Rooms did a good job.

Name: ayushimittall
Title: Great Experience
Review: Overall it was a great one hour experience of solving the mystery as well as the staff is so nice there ..loved the experience nd would love to visit sometime soon to solve some new mystery!

Name: Sayyam2000
Title: Total Waste of Money and Time
Review: It was a Terrible experience and total waste of money and time . It is highly over charged,I recommend don’t go there

Name: Chhavi2022
Title: Amazing
Review: We went in a group for birthday 🎂. We all had lot of fun and a new and unique experience. Thank you mystery rooms rajouri garden.

Name: manochania788
Title: average
Review: give everyone free money and provide free medals everyone will then love to come there and help in mysteries

Name: maninder1107
Title: Great Concept
Review: The experience was really great however, it is a bit costly. If they would have given 1.5-2hrs at the same price it would have been more reasonable. I visited the mystery rooms with my friends at Rajouri garden.

Name: 812ros
Title: Abduction
Review: The theme was perfect, though the locks were not that good. Even after knowing the right code it took 10 mins just to open the lock which is waste of time. Also, the Hints were not that good. Most of the hints we got were the things that we already completed.

Name: nidhi55333
Title: review
Review: its too expensive as per games the prices should be kept reasonable such that it will be called worthy visit and time should be provided as per difficulty level as after half completing the task you ask for money for extra time required

Name: vatsvaaruni
Title: concept is ok.
Review: Too costly for the given experience. Overall New one for Indian folks. Small kids don't enjoy it. Gud for teenagers

Name: manya871
Title: Entertaining
Review: It was definitely very interesting and new . Since I had visited it before I would say that my visit last time was a bit better but this was also great. Though it sometimes seems that when you are occupied the times run very fast.😅

Name: smaksh2008
Title: it was $hit
Review: the machine was broken everything had a very bad quality the workers didnt know what to do the mystery was very easy

Name: muskaandudi
Title: It's great!! Highly recommend
Review: Go for it guys. Don't think much. It's great to enjoy with a couple of friends. Surely exciting. Do check it out.

Name: sanjanaraj2022
Title: Great Experience
Review: The experience was great. It was very enjoyable and joyful. The mystery rooms were hard, which made them more interesting. The clues were a great help. This was an excellent event.

Name: goenkatina
Title: Amazing experience
Review: My daughter n frens tried moderately  hard level ,still they could not solve it😀.even though they extended time for 15 min,on request.But,on serious note,overall it was great.its a must visit for teens especially.

Name: Sayansh A
Title: Wow......Simply Wonderful
Review: Wow ...What an experienceIt was really thrilling and we had a lot of fun....We did the Silent Legacy....It was my 4th visit and still....It was like first time....It was really fun and I'll surely vist once again

Name: harshitasharma2022
Title: An exciting experience
Review: Mystery rooms keep you on the edge and make you feel like a protagonist in a thriller movie. Worth the try.

Name: khuushi390
Title: Thrilling experience
Review: It was an awesome experience. It felt like I am in a movie. We solved some quiz and all hidden doors and the set up was very good.

Name: kushagra0410
Title: The props were broken and that single prop wasted our 20 min
Review: The props were broken and it wasted our 20 min then when we told them they were arguing with us that we broke it

Name: yashasgarg5
Title: Terrible, feeling cheated
Review: One of the main clues was broken which wasted 20 mins of my teams time, when the hour got over they didn’t have us extra time because of the broken clue and said that we will have to play for 15 mins extra

Name: anan0ymus
Title: Excellent mystery
Review: A wonderful experiennce. I went with my friends there and we enjoyed a ton. My best 1 hour in november.Thank you so much mystery rooms.

Name: Namrata C
Title: Unique Experience that passes by way too quickly
Review: Given the details of the puzzles, there is no way it can be done and more importantly, enjoyed, in 60 minutes. It’s such a flash of events, that one does not get to enjoy the storyline properly. Perhaps, if the time limit were increased to 2 hours or even 90 minutes, it would be a more fulfilling experience for the participants. Hope the organisers take this feedback into consideration!

Name: shreyakandwal9
Title: Bad staff service
Review: I honestly love mystery rooms but i was tremendously disappointed today and i doubt i will revisit. I love the cp mystery room and decided to visit the rajouri franchise as well. The place has a nice aura around it but the staff was very unprofessional and had no value for the customer. The way while  communicating to a customer was horrible. At a point the staff was scolding us while  we were playing the game for asking the appropriate hints.I hated the experience!!!!!They didnt even give us the game we were looking for.The cost on Saturday and Sunday is 900 per person and on weekdays it's 600.Ps. If I wanted to get scolded today I would have stayed home.😅

Name: FlintFlopper
Title: Really good experience
Review: Really nice and tense experience me and my friends had alot of fun Looking forward to pay a visit again

Name: CreativeD_YT
Title: First escape room
Review: Having watched many escape rooms, this was actually my first time ever attempting an escape room myself. It was a lot of fun trying out The Hurt Locker as my first escape room. I would recomend The Hurt Locker as your first one too as its not that hard but still only 35% of people make it. Good luck!

Name: sakshambajaj0903
Title: WOAH
Review: Great experience. It was fun and mind blowing. It was quite challenging. Me and my friends really enjoyed

Name: mansivarshney13
Title: I Enjoyed
Review: It was a experience. I'll definitely visit again some time. if you solving mystery the place is a must go.

Name: sejalsinha
Title: Employees there were not at all welcoming.
Review: I dont know about other branches but the Rajouri Garden one has really really rude lady inside the mystery rooms who is supposed to explain us the rules and stuff. Receptionist was sweet but the one who has to explain and control everything was so unwelcoming as if we were her enemies. Really bad services she was very ill mannered.They just try to gain more and more money first from the tickets and then if you dont complete your heist they convience you to pay a lot more to continue it.The themes were well planned but the way that lady was behaving is not worth spending that much money. No respect for customers .

Name: Riya3nair
Title: The CP one is better.
Review: Rude staff, abduction mystery room was based on GK and maths and was not mysterious at all. They were delaying the steps even though we had already gotten them right. This was at Rajouri

Name: Varsha93
Title: brainstorming
Review: it was creative and brainstorming. it was an amazing experience to solve the tales. it's a good option to have fun with friends.

Name: naman2103_ng
Title: goood one
Review: It was so much fun and riddles are appreciable. ABDUCTION was commendable. Surely the best experience I had

Name: sakshamjain209
Title: good and wonderful
Review: as you have said that you will post our photo that you take when we to mystery rooms on instagram and facebook but you not post it

Name: naturelover2211
Title: Great fun
Review: Superb fun for all age groups as well as complete outing for families..easily accessible location..just staff needs to have  little more professionalism in briefing of game  which one is playing and their behaviour to enrich the whole experience

Name: maadhav0101
Title: Okayish playing silent legacy
Review: The experience was okayish playing silent legacy, the cards answer was given to us by the game master, however it wasn't correct according to the printed instructions, upon ending we asked the explanation and she said we did mistake however it was game master who showed us the solution. Similarly a couple of more puzzles and their answers didn't make sense. I've played almost every other games but this was really disappointing.

Name: purnima2021
Title: Not soo cool
Review: We stuck in one room..we are unable to find anything..locks are soo old..too much costly as per the service.

Name: nishchaymago
Title: Glitchy experience
Review: The tv was not working, clues were not given on time, Help button was not working,The supervisor had gone somewhere else instead of giving us clues,Shortage of medals

Name: Aastha Sharma
Title: Adrenaline rush!
Review: My experience has been been wonderfully exciting. My friends and I owe our success to the employees who guided us through out without somehow running the game for us!

Name: Aanyagupta
Title: Adventurous
Review: Great place to visit with friends would not advise for children under 9 or 10 years but nice experience also visit with not more than 3 or 4 people. I am 13 and visited with one person more we enjoyed so muchh great set up and great theme really liked it . We are planning to go again . Atleast a one time visit place . You should totally check this out.

Name: Avishek Bhagat
Title: Valentine Day
Review: Me and my girlfriend visited this place to spend our Valentine's day here and it was really a great experience visiting here. I really enjoyed the place and vibe it gave. The staff were so helpful and friendly they gave the best service. I really would visit this place again and also appreciate the staff for such great services. Highly recommended place.

Name: Avinash P
Title: Mystery
Review: It was very nice experience.Would like to go again and again.Staff behavior was quite impressive.They were friendly also disciplined.Service was very goodReally loved it...

Name: Firoz Ansari
Title: Best place
Review: One of the best place i have ever visited. Thinking of spending some good time with friends must visit this place. They give some amazing task. Which is wonderful to play with the friends. The staff of the place is polite they are just good. Must visit it's a highly recommend place. To enjoy

Name: Raghav Sharma
Title: Mystery room a gaming challenge
Review: 3 months agoIt's great to be there, we enjoyed a lot. We played like a team helping eachother, it's awesome. When in room we forgot everything and everyone from outer world and used our brains a lot. Opening locks one by one gives us a feeling of achieving something. Nice tricks and great effort by mystery people. Hoping to come again.

Name: Disha0000
Title: Excellent environment!
Review: The staff friendliness and behaviour was very healthy.we had an amazing experience as the ambience was very fun and cheerful! The staff was up-to-time w food services and other extra-activies. The cleanliness and surroundings were up to the mark. I had an amazing experience!

Name: Tanviiis
Title: Brain storming
Review: A great place to have fun with your friends.Place mystery games and do some brain storming.Ambience is also great. Its comfortable and pleasant for all the visitors.You have to pay money and get access to games. The staff here is really helpful and genuinely courteous. I really liked their service.

Name: Shivi Aggarwal
Title: Mystery Rooms
Review: This is nice place to spend time and have lot of fun with friends. Ambiance is really nice and staff was polite. I love mystery room game as i like to explore and solve mystery.Overall was great experience here, will do visit soon

Name: kritiarora29
Title: IT WAS A GREAT EXPERIENCE.
Review: we enjoyed a lot solving puzzles and had fun. The rooms are good and the concept is really exciting.

Name: Ritesh R
Title: Good food for brain
Review: Mystery rooms is a must go place if you like solving puzzles. It is a good brain exercise. The only thing i found lacking was the no. of mazes. There should be more mazes.

Name: advika_gupta
Title: The best experience ever!!
Review: I will definitely suggest u this place for an outing.....it's perfect to go with friends, family, solo, in couple, with anyone.....I will surely visit it again very soon....gonna be a frequent visitor for sure...loved mystery rooms.

Name: tanejarohin314
Title: Very good
Review: It was a very good experience. We enjoyed a lot. We choose bomb blast and at the last point only 10 second were left and one lock was still left to be opened.

Name: Atul A
Title: Very Average & not worth
Review: It was confusing & not properly defined. Should be more engaging and entertaining. Charges (900 Per Person) don't justify.

Name: layogaruna
Title: Great experience.. but little too expensive
Review: I believe 500 per head is more than enough, if there is a group of more than 5 individuals. But they charge 800 per head on weekends.Experience is good apart from that, but it is little too expensive.

Name: ShadowMan_159
Title: Greatest experience ever
Review: If you want to try something thrilling and adventurous with your friends than you must try mystery rooms once. { Pro tip :-- Must took someone with good humors and also good in solving riddles ;) }

Name: noopkaushik314
Title: Hurt locker
Review: Great experience we really enjoyed a lott.The only disappointment was during our game there was a cut in electricity due to which we had to wait for 40-45min as they were not having any backup as such.But coming to game and the experience it was GREAT.

Name: Garima J
Title: Must visit for a thrilling experience!
Review: We went there on our son's 9th birthday.it was an awesome experience solving those mystery puzzles and decoding the codes.an altogether different experience.the whole staff at mystery room is very helpful n they love what they do.😊👍👍

Name: sachdevamn
Title: Great experience
Review: It was my daughters bday and she ws keen on mystery rooms as she had been dere before and quite liked d place.Even her birthday went very well.I was extremely satisfied.

Name: kunalbehrani
Title: Fantastic Experience!!!!
Review: This was my third visit to Mystery Rooms.....which means have played three escape games till now....have been to the place with my office team and also my cousins......loved the concept and experience of solving new puzzles....without using any phones....and the overall experience of being trapped in a room and finding all possible ways to come out of it.....overall complete paisa wasool.....and must do for any team building.....family.....friends....Mystery Room....look forward to have a lot of more exciting games in the future!!! All the Best!!!

Name: shivam2614
Title: Awesome
Review: If you like puzzles, this is the place for you. Really enjoyed my visit. Had a really good experience.

Name: Gaurav S
Title: Poor customer service
Review: The guy at reception was rude , he was shouting at the staff - lacked courtesySome one should coach him or guide him. He was like this with everyone around

Name: visheshbansal08
Title: Very good
Review: The time we had with mystery was so much good and we had winning rooms. The mystery rooms was also hard

Name: Prakriti Gupta
Title: Great experience
Review: I visited ere on the recommendation of some relatives who had good experiences. It was my sister's 16 the birthday, an we couldn't think of a better experience on her special day. The mystery was very well planned, and was suitable for all age groups. My parents who usually aren't very adventurous also enjoyed and were equally involved! So, I don't find a reason to remove even half a star from the rating!

Name: Stay573334
Title: Family outing at mystery rooms
Review: it was great fun, solving puzzles with your kido in live environment.Great concept but a costly. wish it would have been a bit cheaper.

Name: mansigupta28
Title: enjoyable and entertaining
Review: i went with my friends to mystery room,it was a very enjoyable and fun experience.Might visit again :)

Name: lokesh d
Title: Nice time to spend
Review: It is fun time to spend with your friends/family. Levels are hard and it will test your intelligence. Overall satisfied and must try. Not that costly if you are going in a group of 5-6.

Name: DSMANHTSSA
Title: Unacceptable service.
Review: First of all, when we first arrived, they were rude from the start. They scolded and disrespected us time and time again. When we went into the escape room, the handcuffs were too tight, cutting off my friends circulation. And they just said "Why should I help you? I should let you die, you're a prisoner." Aside from that whole mess, they kept on making perverted comments asking us what our punishment was for failing the escape room.  This is unacceptable.

Name: sharmagarima1848
Title: Pretty cool
Review: Love the concept. We went for the hurt locker for the first time and it was amazing. Had a pretty good time with my friends.

Name: kapurhemang260
Title: Excellent
Review: It was a really good experience about getting trapped in a room like a real life experience.....it helps you think out of the box and helps you do things only with the objects around you

Name: jatind0gra
Title: A Must-have Experience for all age groups
Review: Mystery rooms is a very unique and innovative Real life escape game in which one has 60 minutes to solve the puzzles and get out of the room. The story-line of the games are interesting and you need to work together as teams to get out. It challenges your brain, skills and team-work. Do visit with your family or friends and you might come out with a deeper bond with them.

Name: Akshay Arya
Title: Inferno
Review: The setup for this level was actually a mind twister n decoding the hints was fun. We had an amazing experience in that mystery room.

Name: HimanshuRao12
Title: Amazing experience
Review: What a great experience it was.Totally enjoyed it. Loved it.Challenging level of clues and puzzles.Brain exercise done right.

Name: Abhinav Duggal
Title: A truly fun-filled experience
Review: I would recommend this to everyone who loves solving puzzles and is bored of the conventional movies and eating out as the only options for hanging out.

Name: Amalia Kapur
Title: Challenging but a lot of fun
Review: Went for a friend's birthday and we had a lot of fun. The room was a bit challenging but it's a great team building activity. After looking at some reviews, i would definitely agree it was a bit pricey and staff could have been a little more welcoming but a great experience overall.

Name: RJ_THE_BEAST
Title: insane experience
Review: it the insane experience as i have experienced it first time i will be glad to visit again with my all friends.....

Name: Naman S
Title: Amazing experience
Review: A really good choice. I have been to3 different escape rooms in 3 different countries but the best one is this one

Name: Trisha Kumar
Title: Awesome experience for the brave hearted
Review: little expensive though it's totally worth it with friends and family. Mystery rooms offers games based on levels and trust me it's not for the faint hearted. Staff is prompt and very efficient. A must visit site and once is definitely not enough. It is situated in a gaming zone and has some mini restaurants for quick bites.
